Sentencas: In a direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell (DC-SOFC), solid carbonaceous fuel is supplied directly to SOFC anode.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This approach offers advantages of high efficiency, system simplicity and possibility of direct conversion for a wide range of solid, carbonaceous fuels.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Additional improvements in the cell performance can be achieved with the application of catalysts.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Two alternative approaches have been considered to apply catalysts in a DC-SOFC configuration.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In the first approach, activated carbon has been impregnated with inexpensive Fe2O3 catalyst before supplying to the anode compartment as a fuel.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In the alternative approach, SOFC anode has been impregnated with Fe2O3 catalyst while the non-catalyzed activated carbon was supplied to the anode as a fuel.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In both cases, the current density for a fuel cell operating at 0.7 V, more than doubled in comparison to previously reported results in a similar test setup.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This result points to the reverse Boudouard reaction (C + CO2 -> 2CO) as a limiting process for the fuel cell performance.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Utilization of the in-situ generated CO improved for catalyst-impregnated anode, enabling higher conversion efficiency.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Moreover, the impregnation of anode with Fe2O3 consumes 17-times less catalyst than impregnation of carbon, with similar cell performance.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The obtained results were compared to other DC-SOFC performance improvement approaches reported in the literature.
Titulo: The effect of Fe2O3 catalyst on direct carbon fuel cell performance
